channel.title: My tor network doesn’t connect in my virtual machine
channel.description: Bootstrapped 85%: Finishing handshake with first hop. When ever I try import whonix gateway OVA File it stops at 85% .Bootstrapped 85%: Finishing handshake with first hop. and after waiting for over hours doesn’t get to tor network. Please help

item.title: My tor network doesn’t connect in my virtual machine
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Could be broader Tor censorship. Check by following these steps first:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Whonix_is_Preventing_Tor_from_Bootstrapping.21

Read full topic
item.source: My tor network doesn’t connect in my virtual machine
